mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product (title, product_name, content, register_location, register_ip, created_at, updated_at, reload_at, price, status, seller_id, is_negotiable, is_possible_meet_you, category) VALUES (#{title}, #{productName}, #{content}, #{registerLocation}, #{registerIp}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW(), #{price}, #{status}, #{sellerId}, #{isNegotiable}, #{isPossibleMeetYou}, #{category})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.product_name, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.reload_at, p.price, p.status, p.seller_id, p.is_negotiable, p.is_possible_meet_you, p.category, img.uuid_name AS product_image FROM tb_product p LEFT JOIN tb_product_image img ON p.id = img.product_id AND img.image_index = 0 ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
